@graph.title: Physics of sedimentology : textbook and reference
@graph.abstract: This book is a textbook devoted to the physics of sedimentological processes. The applicability of fundamental principles, such as Newton's Three Laws of Motion, the Law of Conservation of Energy, the First and Second Laws of Thermodynamics and of other physical relations in hydraulics and groundwater hydrologyare illustratedthe discussion of natural processes which form sediments or sedimentary rocks. The author has an academic background in physics and geology, and his 40- years' experience in teaching and researchenable him to coalesce physics and geology in this enjoyable and highly readable book. In the second edition several chapters have been updated and amended.
